splash.title: We empower your people.
splash.body: Zero is a boutique firm that ships hard-hitting custom software

who.title: We're a small Canadian team delivering big results
who.body: We're a tightly-knit team that delivers matchless agility and attention-to-detail to projects of all sizes. Choosing Zero for your project means choosing creativity, quality and speedy delivery.
who.buttonExplanation: See what we've built for others who trusted us in and around the GTA.

how.title: Our success is thanks to experienced talent and tech-heavy leadership
how.body: We focus on the two main drivers of success:
points: Our people, who have worked hard for years to learn how to shape technology
Our processes, built on our talents' experience and insight.
how.buttonExplanation: Read what our talent has to say about technology.

what.title: We offer JavaScript expertise with a focus on the frontend
what.body: We're proudly a part of the amazing full stack Javascript community. Node.js, React, Vue and Angular have revolutionized how products are built, and we're no strangers to any of them.
what.buttonExplanation: See what we can do for your company.
